root.name: OutRun Europa
root.description: OverviewYou escape a gang of thieves with five different vehicles at your disposal ranging from an (unlicensed) Corvette to a speedboat. The races are checkpoint based. The vehicles also have weapons built in.Critical ReceptionWhen the Game Gear version was released Electronic Gaming Monthly issued the following scores, 5,7,7,7 adding, "...the action on this cart is almost as good as the arcade version. The ride in this game is smooth as silk and loads of fun to boot".
